participants.prompt: List all meeting participants with their roles
participants.name: Meeting Participants
participants.description: Detailed list of attendees with roles

attendees.name: Participant's full name
attendees.department: Department or team they represent, if nothing is mentioned then label as Unknown

duration.prompt: Extract the duration of the meeting, if not mentioned then return 0, It should always be in minutes
duration.name: Meeting Duration
duration.description: Duration of the meeting in minutes

duration_users.prompt: Extract estimated duration of each participants contribution in the meeting, if not mentioned then return 0, It should always be in minutes
duration_users.name: Meeting Duration
duration_users.description: Duration of the meeting in minutes

speaking_duration.name: Participant's full name
speaking_duration.duration: Estimated duration of the participant's contribution in minutes

attributes.meeting_type: Type of meeting (status, planning, review, etc.)
attributes.scheduled_time: When was the meeting scheduled for
attributes.actual_start_time: When did the meeting actually start

raci_matrix.prompt: Based on the discussion, identify RACI (Responsible, Accountable, Consulted, Informed) assignments for mentioned tasks and decisions
raci_matrix.name: RACI Matrix

responsible: Names of people who will do the work
assignments.accountable: Name of the single person accountable
consulted: Names of people to be consulted
informed: Names of people to be informed

action_items.prompt: List all action items discussed in the meeting
action_items.name: Action Items
action_items.description: Tracked action items and their owners

risks_issues.name: Risks and Issues
risks_issues.description: Track project risks and active issues

decisions.prompt: List all decisions made during the meeting
decisions.name: Decision Log

project_metrics.prompt: Extract any mentioned project metrics or KPIs
project_metrics.name: Project Metrics

synthesis_summary.prompt: Create a comprehensive synthesis of the meeting outcomes
synthesis_summary.name: Meeting Synthesis
synthesis_summary.description: Comprehensive synthesis of meeting outcomes and implications

key_outcomes: Main outcomes or decisions from the meeting

stakeholder_updates.stakeholder_group: Group of stakeholders to be updated

follow_up_items.prompt: List all follow-up items from the meeting
follow_up_items.name: Follow-up Items
follow_up_items.description: Items requiring follow-up after the meeting

communication_plan.prompt: Create a communication plan based on meeting outcomes
communication_plan.name: Communication Plan

next_steps.prompt: List the high-level next steps and key takeaways from the meeting
next_steps.name: Next Steps
next_steps.description: High-level summary of next steps and key actions

initial_classification.name: Initial Meeting Classification
initial_classification.prompt: Analyze the meeting content and classify the type of meeting (status, decision, planning, or review)
initial_classification.description: Initial analysis of meeting type and purpose

basic_extraction.name: Basic Information Extraction
basic_extraction.prompt: Extract fundamental meeting information and next steps

status_analysis.name: Status Meeting Analysis
status_analysis.explain: This is a project status update meeting - analyze metrics and risks

decision_analysis.name: Decision Meeting Analysis
decision_analysis.explain: This meeting involves key project decisions - analyze decisions and responsibilities

planning_analysis.name: Planning Meeting Analysis
planning_analysis.explain: This is a planning or strategy meeting - analyze plans and assignments

review_analysis.name: Review Meeting Analysis
review_analysis.explain: This is a project review meeting - analyze performance and issues
